sqlMap.select: select TRANS_ID, IC_INCIDENT_ID, CREATE_TIME, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, LOGIN_CODE, OBJECT_NAME, IT_PHASE, TRANS_TYPE, CONTENTS, SC_OP_ID, LOGIN_CODE2, OP_NAME2 from IC_TRANSACTION where TRANS_ID = #transId:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.insert: insert into IC_TRANSACTION (TRANS_ID, IC_INCIDENT_ID, CREATE_TIME, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, LOGIN_CODE, OBJECT_NAME, IT_PHASE, TRANS_TYPE, CONTENTS, SC_OP_ID, LOGIN_CODE2, OP_NAME2) values (#transId:DECIMAL#, #icIncidentId:DECIMAL#, #createTime:DATE#, #objectType:VARCHAR#, #objectId:DECIMAL#, #loginCode:VARCHAR#, #objectName:VARCHAR#, #itPhase:VARCHAR#, #transType:VARCHAR#, #contents:VARCHAR#, #scOpId:DECIMAL#, #loginCode2:VARCHAR#, #opName2:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update IC_TRANSACTION set IC_INCIDENT_ID = #icIncidentId:DECIMAL#, CREATE_TIME = #createTime:DATE#, OBJECT_TYPE = #objectType:VARCHAR#, OBJECT_ID = #objectId:DECIMAL#, LOGIN_CODE = #loginCode:VARCHAR#, OBJECT_NAME = #objectName:VARCHAR#, IT_PHASE = #itPhase:VARCHAR#, TRANS_TYPE = #transType:VARCHAR#, CONTENTS = #contents:VARCHAR#, SC_OP_ID = #scOpId:DECIMAL#, LOGIN_CODE2 = #loginCode2:VARCHAR#, OP_NAME2 = #opName2:VARCHAR# where TRANS_ID = #transId:DECIMAL#

update IC_TRANSACTION
IC_INCIDENT_ID = #icIncidentId:DECIMAL#
CREATE_TIME = #createTime:DATE#
OBJECT_TYPE = #objectType:VARCHAR#
OBJECT_ID = #objectId:DECIMAL#
LOGIN_CODE = #loginCode:VARCHAR#
OBJECT_NAME = #objectName:VARCHAR#
IT_PHASE = #itPhase:VARCHAR#
TRANS_TYPE = #transType:VARCHAR#
CONTENTS = #contents:VARCHAR#
SC_OP_ID = #scOpId:DECIMAL#
LOGIN_CODE2 = #loginCode2:VARCHAR#
OP_NAME2 = #opName2:VARCHAR#
where TRANS_ID = #transId:DECIMAL#
